title: Redesign UI with elegant dark theme
description:
Redesign Nacre with an elegant, functional, slick, simple aesthetic inspired by docs/example.png (Vectorian style).

Key design elements:
- Deep charcoal background (#1a1a1a or similar)
- Warm copper/bronze accent colors instead of blue
- Clean serif or italic typography for headlines
- Minimalist top navigation
- Subtle card highlighting with warm tones
- Generous whitespace and breathing room
- Editorial, sophisticated feel
- Optional light/dark mode toggle

Apply consistently across: Issues list, Board, Epics, PRDs, and Issue detail views.
close_reason: Implemented elegant dark theme with warm copper accents, serif typography, and refined styling across all views

title: Sort epics and PRDs by most recent first
description:
Order items with most recent on top across views:

- / (Issues): Sort epic groups by most recently updated epic first
- /epics: Sort epics by most recently updated first  
- /prds: Sort PRD files by most recently modified first (currently alphabetical)

Use updated_at timestamp for epics, file modification time for PRDs.
close_reason: Sort epics by updated_at (most recent first) on / and /epics, PRDs by file modification time

title: Implement theme switcher with light/dark modes
description:
Add theme switching functionality with both dark and light themes.

Features:
- Toggle button in header (sun/moon icons)
- Persist preference in localStorage
- Respect system preference (prefers-color-scheme) as default
- Smooth transition between themes

Dark theme: Deep charcoal with warm copper accents (from nacre-59c)
Light theme: Clean, warm off-white/cream background with matching copper accents, good contrast for readability

Use CSS custom properties for easy theming.
close_reason: Implemented theme switcher with dark/light modes, localStorage persistence, and system preference detection
